'''1.2.12'''<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/360004167971-Minecraft-New-Nintendo-3DS-Edition-1-2|title=Minecraft: New Nintendo 3DS Edition - 1.2|date=December 22, 2017}}</ref> is an update for the {{el|ds}} released on December 22, 2017, which adds achievements and fixes bugs.

== Additions ==
=== General ===
'''Achievements'''
* Added [[Achievement/Legacy Console and New Nintendo 3DS editions|Achievement]]s.

'''GUI'''
* Added [[effect]] icons and timers to the [[HUD]].

== Changes == 
=== General ===
* Various UI fixes and tweaks.{{more info}}
* Performance and stability improvements.{{more info}}

== Fixes ==
* Fixed hardlock that occurred sometimes with [[bed|sleep mode]].

== Trivia ==
* This was the only New Nintendo 3DS version that was released on the same day in both North America and Japan.
